about_the_game:
Jay's Mod - Discover a Growing Roleplay Adventure with Endless Possibilities

Welcome to Jay's Mod, a captivating roleplay video game passionately crafted by our small team of developers. Harnessing the power of the advanced Unreal Engine 5, Jay's Mod aims to deliver visually stunning graphics and a deeply immersive environment. We invite you to join us on this incredible journey as we continue to expand and enhance the game, unlocking its full potential.
Embark on a thrilling adventure in Simpsonville, our first map inspired by the US system, featuring meticulously crafted custom models, buildings, and environments. As we grow and develop Jay's Mod, we envision Simpsonville as the inaugural setting in a series of diverse, engaging maps that will form the rich tapestry of our game world. Engage with other players to establish alliances, friendships, or rivalries, all while contributing to the ever-evolving social landscape of the game.

Dive into diverse gameplay opportunities as you explore various money-making ventures, such as woodworking, weapons smithing, or selling weapons. More daring players may be drawn to illicit activities like growing marijuana, cooking crystal meth, and masterminding kidnappings. As Jay's Mod continues to develop, we plan to offer countless ways for players to make their mark, whether as a savvy entrepreneur, a cunning thief, or a unique blend of the two.
As we progress in development, we hope to introduce a range of vehicles and self-made gun models with custom functionality, providing exciting new ways to navigate the challenges of Simpsonville. We also aim to implement a robust economic system, complete with bank accounts and transactions, to add depth and realism to your gaming experience.

We believe that a strong, supportive community is the backbone of any successful game, and we're dedicated to fostering a welcoming environment for players to share their experiences and ideas. We encourage you to join our community platforms, where you can interact with fellow players and our team. Together, we can build a vibrant, caring community that shapes the future of Jay's Mod, ensuring it remains a thrilling and engaging experience for all.
As a game that is constantly evolving, we highly value your feedback and suggestions as we strive to create an unforgettable gaming experience. Our focus on community-driven development helps ensure that Jay's Mod grows and evolves in response to the needs and desires of our players.
Join us on this exhilarating journey in Jay's Mod, where your decisions help shape a living, breathing virtual world. We are excited to see the directions this adventure will take us and are grateful for your ongoing support and enthusiasm as we bring our collective vision to life.

As our customer, you can expect the following features:
    Core features:
  • Working character system: in which you can create, customize and delete your character(s). Also includes a synchronized inventory system. (in early access the amount of characters is limited to 1)
  • Economic simulation: includes Cash, Bank account, ATMs, Market simulation. (price accomodation)
  • Official servers: are adjusted in performance to players needs and have a high tickrate (60). (community servers are sought to be unlocked later during development should allow customization)
  • Occupation system: become a Law Enforcement Officer, Firefighter, Paramedic, or take the unofficial route as a Farmer, Lumberjack, Weapons Dealer, Miner or Chemist.
  • Illegality: choose the "dark side" and earn your riches through various methods, such as Crystal Meth or Marijuana. If you dare to, you can also take hostages, become a hitman or blackmail people.

    Other features:
  • Weapons system: shoot your enemies, stab them or punch them to death. It's your choice.
  • Vehicle system: drive around beautiful Simpsonville in your favourite car. You can choose from 3 cars.

    Map specific:
  • Hand-crafted custom map: Simpsonville is our first, but hopefully not last map. It is based in off of a city in Texas, US, but features our own little touch. The map is 2x2km in size and includes a lake, hotel, 2 farms, a trailerpark, a city, an industrial complex and a secret laboratory.

We hope you enjoy the journey and become an active member of our growing community. If you have any questions or suggestions, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your support!

Jay and the whole team behind Jay's Mod

content_descriptors.notes: Depiction of violence, weapons, drugs, nudity, alcohol.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
